properties.areaDesc: Grand Haven to Whitehall MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI; Whitehall to Pentwater MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 14 at 3:11PM EST until January 15 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 10 to 20 knots
with gusts up to 25 knots and waves 3 to 5 feet. For the Gale
Watch, northwest winds 20 to 30 knots with gusts up to 35
knots and waves 5 to 8 feet possible.

* WHERE...Holland to Pentwater.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 AM EST Wednesday.
For the Gale Watch, from Wednesday evening through Thursday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING
